description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The tallest tower of the city Sky Zoni is under threat.  As the Air Commander, combat the militants, paratroopers and their helicopters.  The game features four different modes and variety of bombs.  Can you restore the Jewel of the Orio City?
